channel.title: Special Bar Stays Same?
channel.description: When I activate my special attack, it turns cyan, the way I want it to, but when I click it again, it doesn't shut off. So I never know if my Special Bar is on or off... Help? [317] AllstarScape Source.

item.title: Special Bar Stays Same?
item.dc:creator: @Khan_ZooZoo Khan_ZooZoo
item.description:
@Khan_ZooZoo wrote:

When I activate my special attack, it turns cyan, the way I want it to, but when I click it again, it doesn’t shut off. So I never know if my Special Bar is on or off… Help? [317] AllstarScape Source.

Read full topic
